channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 06:40 Air alarm to Cherkasy District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 06:40 Air alarm to Cherkasy District Surveat for Further Messages.#Cherkasy This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
